description: A beautiful addition to any barbecue, juicy mango, tomato, prosciutto and basil marry perfectly together in this fresh and vibrant salad.
keywords: Salad,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Quick & easy,Dec 2021,Christmas,Soy free,Wheat free,Tomato,Mango,Peanut free
name: Tomato, Mango, Prosciutto & Basil Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 Calypso mango, peeled, cut into thin wedges
2 tbs Woolworths extra virgin olive oil

recipeInstructions.text: Arrange tomato, mango and prosciutto on a large plate.
Whisk zest, lime juice, honey and oil in a small bowl until combined. Season with pepper.
Drizzle dressing over salad and serve scattered with basil leaves.
